start:
﷽  Hᴇʟʟᴏ 👋,

Tʜɪs Is A Tᴇʟᴇɢʀᴀᴍ Qᴜʀᴀɴ Rᴇᴀᴅᴇʀ Bᴏᴛ

Yᴏᴜ Cᴀɴ Usᴇ Tʜɪs Bᴏᴛ To Rᴇᴀᴅ Qᴜʀᴀɴ

Cʟɪᴄᴋ /help Cᴏᴍᴍᴀɴᴅ Tᴏ Nᴏᴡ Mᴏʀᴇ

Pᴏᴡᴇʀᴇᴅ Bʏ : @AIOM_BOTS
help:
Through this bot you can open the Quran by sending:
🌟 Order /open 
And You can open a specific page by submitting 
🌟 go to page <page number>
And you can retrieve specific pages by sending 
🌟 fetch page <page number> jOIN @SafoTheBot For Support
